Maria Lopez.description: conversing about finalizing the itinerary for tomorrow's friends night out, between Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus, how's your day going so far?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria, my day is going well, thank you. How about you?
Maria Lopez
I'm doing great, thanks. I wanted to talk to you about finalizing the itinerary for tomorrow's friends night out. Are you available to meet at Hobbs Cafe tonight?
Klaus Mueller
Sure, I can meet at Hobbs Cafe tonight. What time works for you?
Maria Lopez
How about 7pm? Is that convenient for you?
Klaus Mueller
7pm works for me. I'll see you at Hobbs Cafe tonight.
